website_summaries.verdict: Not the sturdiest striking bag, but it's offered at a very low price for those just starting.
pros: Includes anchors for the floor and ceiling, as well as nylon rope, so you can start using it right away
Uses a synthetic leather construction for a reasonable level of build quality for those who are just learning
Extremely low price versus other options
cons: Parts are not of the highest quality, so it will not last if subjected to heavy workouts

customer_reviews.title: Best exercise I got was running to the store to replace it.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. On the first use,the cheap bungee chords slipped their hook, and winged me off the head. OK, my mistake for trusting a cheap chord. On the fourth use, the bladder inside slipped off the pump hole and deflated. Tried like mad but I can't get it back on the nipple attachment. Complete waste. Boxing is dangerous enough without using sub-par equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great striker!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for over a month now, and it is an excellent bag, especially for the price. I'm not sure why there are bad reviews for this bag, people must not know how to use it, or are using it inappropriately. But even with a hard workout on it, this bag will take a beating and keep coming back for more. I suggest, if you are unfamiliar with technique, that you check out some youtube videos on using a double end striker bag.
customer_reviews.author: CampbellCrew

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for about a year and it’s still in decent shape. I was worried about the durability bc of cheaper price. Mostly used 16oz, but even without gloves the bag holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Deflation Problems
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second one of these I ordered. I thought the first one and its issues might be a one off but both of the units I ordered, after moderate use in a clean dry space, lost inflation and will not inflate again or hold any air. I noticed my second one was completely deflated yesterday. Pumped it back up. Seemed okay. 10 minutes later, completely deflated. Both had the same issue. I will not be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: SirBill94

customer_reviews.title: READ IF YOU DO NOT KNOW HOW TO INFLATE
customer_reviews.text: so here is what you do. Listen up. At the bottom of the ball there is an orange thing that you are going to stick the needle in and begin pumping. When it is filled up to your liking. You are going to grab that orange thing and pull it out. That closes the valve that releases air. That is how you fill it up the rest is self explanatory. If you do not grab the orange thing and pull on it, air will just keep coming out.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Made terrible and looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not a good buy. There are strings hanging from the tread everywhere. It looks used and worn but is brand new. The bag wouldn't take any air at first and then I had to keep adjusting the inside bag before it finally inflated. I would not recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Wita

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect. Ive had it a couple weeks during the coronavirus quarantine and ita been up since i opened the box. Everyday i use it for like an hour. Ill pass by it and go for a round. Thing is fun. Dont know about all these negative reviews- its $20, man. Its not the level quality they have at gyms. But i kmock this thing around pretty good bare fisted (not recommended) cuz im too lazy to wrap hands but the point is- this bag can handle it. So glad i ordered this, ill definitely another one if it ever falls apart or pops.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for tall areas, doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It did not last a month, the ropes with hooks do not stretch long, the longest they'd probably stretch is about to 8ft, I hanged mine in the garage which is approximately 10 ft and it broke within a minute of testing it so I then tried itwith a rope on the bottom and the rope with hook on top and it lasted over a week until it eventually broke again. Overall not durable as it is only good for short areas like a bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Bladder wont fully inflate on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The bladder holds maybe half the air it should and doesn't even stretch the bag. The bag itself has loose threads right out of the bag. Should have known better for the price, the everlast name had me thinking different. Wouldn't recommend, spend the money on if you're even remotely serious about training.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Marsello

customer_reviews.title: Bungees SUCK!
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is great. The mounting brackets are very stout. The bungees that hold the bag vertical, however, SUCK!!! They break with only a little tension. If you buy this product, throw away the bungees before they pop off and smack you, like they did me. I replied them with proper bungees and the bag is bombproof.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: It isn't that great, but it isnt all bad
customer_reviews.text: It isn't that great, but it isnt all bad. Look at the price and adjust the expectations. I bought this for my 9 year old to practice with in the garage. The air does leak out of the bladder, so we have to pump it up before every use. It works. If this gets more use, we will upgrade on the next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: One Man's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Ropes should adjust for different height. These are way to small
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have used this about a dozen times now and went to use and it is already flat. Took it apart and the seam is apart! Disappointing! This is not right! I will try to use a rubber cement hopefully this fixes it?
customer_reviews.author: TROY

customer_reviews.title: Loses air frequently- go with higher quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after watching many satisfied customers on Youtube. I read a few product reviews and saw the product was hit and miss (in terms of quality). This product is acceptable in terms of utility. The product is difficult to inflate and it goes flat once a week. It generally loses air within hours of inflation. Everlast is pretty economical if you are on a tight budget or not ready to commit a lot of money to other products. This is one of those products where I recommend going with a higher (more expensive) quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted me 2 weeks after receiving it. It suddenly just deflated and when I tried inflating it, there are leaks all over the bladder. When you try to find the leaks/holes to 'patch' the bladder, it's nearly impossible due to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! These bags are meant to take a ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my boxing friend. He loved it! These bags are meant to take a beating and they do just that! Great price for an itemyou know you will need to eventually replace depending on how often you use them. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: I have this punching bad hung up in my garage. It was easy to set up. This purchase is a great way to relieve stress after a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend and I use it sometimes, it works well for the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A. Augustine

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: The inner tube in this double end bag popped after just 3 weeks of using it. So it was obviously not very durable. Very disappointed. It is very hard to find local places or any for that matter that fix inner tubes like this.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smithe

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold air upon arrival. Cheapest piece of garbage I’ve ever seen. K Just look at it with the cheap plastic. The threads? Are u serious everlast?
customer_reviews.author: Tester of all products

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality what so ever. Feels super cheap but it Does it’s job. Can’t complain for price.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use. Bungee cords make the all to low for me but still good. Unfortunately the bladder did not last much but nothing crazy glue can't fix
customer_reviews.author: Luis_Fer82

customer_reviews.title: There were also a bunch of loose threads from poor stitching hanging off the one I received
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really small and cheap. The velcro doesnt stick once it is inflated and the straps are not adjustable. There were also a bunch of loose threads from poor stitching hanging off the one I received. Cheap Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Digs Dad

customer_reviews.title: Check the Bladder
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open this product for weeks due the installment of hardware and formidable access.... When inflated the bladder would deflate within an hour...apparently there is a hole or tear.... I can not do anything now but I should have checked the package when I received it...!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Briscoe Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is wrong with mine but, it Doesn't hold air . I have to pump it every time I want to use it .only holds air for one day.
customer_reviews.author: gunman

customer_reviews.title: kinda soft obsorbs the strike & dont quite bounce like i feel it should
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this will stand the test of time, made of thin sinthetic material & the bladder went flat right away i have to pump it up every time i use it, kinda soft obsorbs the strike & dont quite bounce like i feel it should, it does work for its intended use but i dont feel challenged when using it.
customer_reviews.author: John R Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Ok double end bag but the bladder inside loses air ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok double end bag but the bladder inside loses air all the time and lasted me about 9 months before picking up a leak. Cannot be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Budhoo

customer_reviews.title: Poorly stitched not sure how long will it last
customer_reviews.text: did not come with the air pin for inflation. And it looks poorly stitched. Contemplating sending it back. Looks like it won't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: it had potential for its price
customer_reviews.text: the bungee cords were to small i couldn’t even use them i had to buy different one’s and the hooks kept coming off the bag when i hit it i do not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully I just got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: I opened this, inflated it, installed it, my 5 year old daughter punched it 8-10 time and it inflated. Now it won’t hold air
customer_reviews.author: blakeslizard

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted about 9 days. Replaced the cords, then the ball got a puncture. Fixed the puncture, then the ball exploded. I know you get what you pay for, but come on. 9 days.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I am not pro but I like to do boxing drills with it I loss10 pounds ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not pro but I like to do boxing drills with it I loss10 pounds doing 5 rounds of 10 minutes almost everyday 👍
customer_reviews.author: retrobiker

customer_reviews.title: Went flat after no use at all.  Wtf?
customer_reviews.text: Cheap garbage don’t waste your money. Get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: cameron balfe

customer_reviews.title: Good construction
customer_reviews.text: This bag is tough. Takes a lot of abuse and was easy to install.my wife uses it as she can pound it better than a heavy bag and the double end construction keeps her from having to duck as it comes back.
customer_reviews.author: AZazz

customer_reviews.title: I'll get another speedbag of better quality, since getting a badly constructed one or ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag on March 12, 2015. As of today, June 12, 2015, the bag has already broken down. I keep the bag as part of my garage gym in Houston, TX (hot and humid). It holds air for a small amount of time, then starts leaking air from the bottom nipple. I'll get another speedbag of better quality, since getting a badly constructed one or one that can't handle temp changes is just wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for 2 weeks straight
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality almost impossible to break even with daily use, try it with no gloves on and just wrapped hands and it can be a tremendous workout, comes with everything you need to mount it.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Used and it worked good for a summer then brought it back out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used and it worked good for a summer then brought it back out the next summer and the bladder was leaking air. The construction isn't that great
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to work up a sweat and get a little cardio going.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good ball for the price. I need to buy a couple eye swivel links to make ball work properly.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to practice on my speed. Looks well made and works well. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Its great aside from the short bungees. It sits low to the ground.

customer_reviews.title: Great product works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: When item arrived the bag would not inflate. I asked for a return and i recieved a new one in 2 days. Great product works perfectly. They made a negative transaction into a positive transaction. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ok
customer_reviews.text: It is ok...not the best but will do the job for beginning

customer_reviews.title: Not bad 😏
customer_reviews.text: I perfer the solid bag over the air bag but for the low price it'll do #sofarsogood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag went flat after a few weeks. Not sure if that's normal or not.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy
customer_reviews.text: Well seeing as it leaked air immediately as I filled it up I am very angry and not pleased with the product and see no way to return it or swap it out yay smh

customer_reviews.title: speed & durability at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: this is what i needed, hand eye coordination, speed & durability at a good price. thanks

customer_reviews.title: Good till it pops
customer_reviews.text: Good for only a couple day after that the ballon I side popped and couldn’t be replaced since it’s not replaceable

customer_reviews.title: Had this for about 10 months used it two times ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 10 months used it two times a week the seams and strap have begin to break but for 24 bucks it has been well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ghaymon

customer_reviews.title: and it's working great for our son
customer_reviews.text: The bungee that came with it broke the same day..should of sent it back but, We just put new ones on, and it's working great for our son.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: It’s the avg double end bad it gets the job done

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have this product for over a year, no problem works great
customer_reviews.author: Yossi Solan

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: This speed bag is not durable. It leaked air not long after I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON REPLACEMENT PROCESS by Coach Kirkland
customer_reviews.text: The ordering and shipping went Great ! but the bag itself did not last no longer than 3 weeks in my gym with regular day to day usage as it was designed for, I'm going to give this item one more chance, if it doesn't make it I will not recommend this product to any gym. the replacement so far no problem ,the new one is on its way to me and the broken one is ready to be shipped back to Amazon. I will keep you all posted on the progress of this" replacement" thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: I like the unit and it arrived as promised
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit and it arrived as promised, but the unit is missing the internal bladder, so I can't inflate or use it.

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy.
customer_reviews.text: The cover on the bladder ball was ripped apart when it arrived and was missing a screw. Not very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I expected small, but the ball is about the size of a softball.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller that expected
customer_reviews.text: The bag was smaller than expected, plus the cords placed the bag at 4 feet from the base. I have the Everlast three station stand. I'll need to find other cords to make this work.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than one month of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on June 18th. On July 16th it deflated and died. This product is not good.

customer_reviews.title: The zipper tends to unzip itself after some hits, ...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper tends to unzip itself after some hits, but it doesn't affect the functionality. It works and its cheap
customer_reviews.author: drac

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Lasted three months only. Then got deflated and no matter what I do , how I pump it up, still loses air. Wouldn’t recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ihar Haishun

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but difficult to get air in, plus after two months of usage, and not heavy usage, lost air and could not replace it. The lost air is due to glue that holds the inside bag to the nozzle. Wish I could have replaced it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Timon

customer_reviews.title: Double End Bag made for people under 5 feet tall.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Everlast 3-station stand. The 2 bungee cords they provided was WAY too short. It barely came up to my stomach and I'm 5' 8". I contacted Everlast support about the short bungee cords but they said to just buy another bungee cord and gave very vague instructions. Why would you sell an incomplete product?!?! Very disappointed with the product and customer service. Just going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Jymi Han

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy your own cables
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt come with the right length bungie cables. You have to buy different ones. Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the device it’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Total junk.
customer_reviews.text: Took this bag all the way to Africa for a kids gym. Both ends holding the bag immediately broke off. It's the only thing in Africa I've ever seen thrown away. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Birrell

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is a basic double end bag. Not as large as I thought it would be, but adequate to work out with. It is easy to attach, but loses air quickly. I have to inflate it every couple of days.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and get the title bag. This one kept deflating and I'm by no means a Mike Tyson.

customer_reviews.title: deflator bag
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't retain air well. Whenever you want to use it, you will have to pump it up. Have no idea of how well the outside will hold up. Guess we will see. If it did hold air, then I would have no complaint about it.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!

Edit: Contact Everlast with the issue and they sent me a new one.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the oxymoronic "Everlast" double end striking bag

product_meta.title: Double End Striking Bag (EA)
product_meta.description:
Double ended striking bag designed for focused strikes

Warranty:

Everlast warrants its products to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for a period of 120 days from date of purchase, provided they have not been subjected to obvious abuse, neglect or misuse. Everlast's sole liability is limited to repairing or replacing products that are returned within this 120-day period, unless specific product literature specifies otherwise.

Please contact customer service for full details, and for replacement assistance at 1-800-821-7930.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
